alert.note: Alert for Kern (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 7:53PM PDT until May 21 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Kern County in central California... * Until 815 PM PDT. * At 752 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located about 9 miles north of California City, moving to the southwest at around 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... California City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
